name: Experience Scroll
description: Double-click to advance a character to level 20. Can only be used by characters under level 20.

name: Pile of Ley Line Dust
description:
An inert pile of dust from a ley line. A jolt of energy from a specialized asuran lab will energize it.
Double-click to show.

name: Story Unlock: The Dragon's Reach, Part 1
Prosperity Mine Kite
description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

name: Unopened Crystal Shard Kite
description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

name: Unopened Prosperity Mine Kite
description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

name: Story Unlock: The Dragon's Reach, Part 2
Mysterious Seedling
description: <c=@flavor>This young carnivorous plant has a wild streak to it. A meal of purified Sacred Plant Food should help it grow to be more obedient.<c>

name: Unopened Ventari Follower Kite
description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

name: Package of Phantasmally Infused Plant Food
description:
Double-click to feed to a Mysterious Sprout.

<c=@flavor>This spicy snack has been infused with the essence of a phantasm and magically prepared for the connoisseur of carnivorous plants.<c>

name: Clay Pot
description: <c=@flavor>Missing just a few things needed to germinate a seed.<c>

name: Brick of Clay
description: Used in the making of pottery.

name: Ventari Follower Kite
description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

name: Bag of Spirit Shards
description: Double-click to gain 30 spirit shards.

name: Purified Vial of Sacred Glacial Water
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Meaty Plant Food, Bloodstone Dust, and Thick Leather Sections to create a Package of Sacred Plant Food.

<c=@flavor>This cool clear mineral water from a sacred glacier could purify and nourish a magically growing plant.<c>

name: Endless Monkey King Tonic
description:
Double-click to drink, transforming you into the Monkey King for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.
Account Bound on Use

name: Cultivated Shoot
description: <c=@flavor>Growth seems to be slowing. You need an extra kick of sun to speed back up the growth process. Something like an Attuned Grow Lamp would be perfect.</c>

name: Experience Scroll
description: Double-click to advance a character to level 25. Can only be used by characters under level 25.

name: Pile of Phantasmal Residue
description:
This residue lies dormant. It could be imbued at a strong phantasmal energy source.
Double-click to show.

name: Recipe: Plate of Piquant Plant Food
description: Double-click to learn the recipe for a Plate of Piquant Plant Food.

name: Plate of Piquant Plant Food
description: <c=@flavor>Just a couple ingredients shy of having the kind of kick an especially persnickety carnivorous plant would enjoy.<c>

name: Recipe: Plate of Meaty Plant Food
description: Double-click to learn the recipe for a Plate of Meaty Plant Food.

name: Plate of Meaty Plant Food
description: <c=@flavor>This mash of meaty, semi-toxic ingredients needs just a few more things to be the kind of food needed to calm a wild carnivorous plant.<c>

name: Ley Line Infused Clay Pot
description:
Double-click to plant a Mysterious Seed in this pot.

<c=@flavor>Everything needed to germinate a very special seed is in this pot now.<c>

name: Ley Line Infused Stone
description:
The polarity of this stone is locked in a stable matrix. A Ley Line disrupting device could unlock its potential forces.
Double-click to show.

name: Package of Oasis Soaked Plant Food
description:
Double-click to feed to a Cultivated Sprout.

<c=@flavor>Soaked in the clean, cool waters from a Maguuma oasis.</c>

name: Summit Hero's Reward
description: <c=@flavor>A gift given in gratitude from the leaders of Tyria.</c>

name: Recipe: Grow Lamp
description: Double-click to learn the recipe for a Grow Lamp.

name: Bag of Spirit Shards
description: Double-click to gain 10 spirit shards.

name: Second Birthday Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Home Portal Stone
description:
Double-click to be transported to your home in your racial city.
Double-click while in your home to return to where you entered from.

name: Crystal Shard Kite
description: Double-click to take out your kite. This kite provides a 5% speed increase, 33% during sandstorms.

name: Bag of Frozen Loot
description: Double-click to open.

name: Cultivated Seedling
description: <c=@flavor>This young carnivorous plant looks hungry for something particularly magical. Some Ley Line Dusted Plant Food should satisfy its cravings.</c>

name: Vial of Mending Oasis Water
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Piquant Plant Food, Bloodstone Dust, and Thick Leather Sections to create a Package of Oasis Soaked Plant Food.

<c=@flavor>The waters of the Maguuma Jungle are famous for having inherent healing powers.</c>

name: Pet Seed
description: <c=@flavor>The next generation of cultivated seed produced by your own hand. To cultivate this new specimen to be even better than the last, plant it in a Mists Infused Clay Pot to germinate.</c>

name: Last Good-Bye
description: <c=@flavor>And just like that, he's gone. A bag of his old belongings is all that's left.</c>

name: Chaos Orb
description:
A humming emanates from this orb. It could be amplified with an additional source of Chaotic Radiation.
Double-click to show.

name: Mysterious Sprout
description: <c=@flavor>This young carnivorous plant could use something with a bit more kick to keep it growing. Some Phantasmally Infused Plant Food should do the trick.<c>

name: Recipe: Clay Pot
description: Double-click to learn the recipe for a Clay Pot.

name: Package of Sacred Plant Food
description:
Double-click to feed to a Mysterious Seedling.

<c=@flavor>Purified with Sacred Glacial Water to keep a wild plant well behaved while it matures.<c>

name: Fourth Birthday Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Chaos Greatsword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Experience Scroll
description: Double-click to advance a character to level 30. Can only be used by characters under level 30.

name: Experience Scroll
description: Double-click to advance a character to level 60. Can only be used by characters under level 60.

name: Polarized Ley Line Infused Stone
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with a Clay Pot, Bloodstone Dust, and Foxfire Clusters to create a Ley Line Infused Clay Pot.

<c=@flavor>It's very difficult to focus your eyes on this stone. The space around it is rich with magical energy.<c>

name: Package of Ley Line Dusted Plant Food
description:
Double-click to feed to a Cultivated Seedling.

<c=@flavor>Dusted with Ley Line power to nourish a growing magical carnivorous plant.</c>

name: Chaos Infused Clay Pot
description:
Double-click to plant a Cultivated Seed in this pot.

<c=@flavor>A pot so infused with energy, it's sure to germinate a more powerful seedling.</c>

name: Vial of Sacred Glacial Water
description:
This water is warm and murky. It could be purified, but only at its source.
Double-click to show.

name: Chaos Longbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Tempest Pistol Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Tempest Hammer Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

name: Pile of Crackling Ley Line Dust
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Meaty Plant Food, Bloodstone Dust, and Thick Leather Sections to create a Package of Ley Line Dusted Plant Food.

<c=@flavor>This dust crackles and pops with magical energy.</c>

name: Cultivated Sprout
description: <c=@flavor>This young carnivorous plant seems restless. Feed it something soothing, like Oasis Soaked Plant Food to calm it down.</c>

name: Mysterious Seed
description: <c=@flavor>Plant in a Ley Line Infused Clay Pot to germinate.<c>

name: Ceremonial Plated Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Chaos Axe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Weirded Phantasmal Residue
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Piquant Plant Food, Bloodstone Dust, and Thick Leather Sections to create a Package of Phantasmally Infused Plant Food.

<c=@flavor>A sticky pile of residue left behind by a powerful spirit.<c>

name: Germinated Foxfire Cluster
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with a Grow Lamp, Bloodstone Bricks, and exotic Essence of Luck to create an Attuned Grow Lamp.

<c=@flavor>A large and potent cluster of Foxfire.</c>

name: Mists Stone
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with a Clay Pot, Bloodstone Dust, and Foxfire Clusters to create a Mists Infused Clay Pot.

<c=@flavor>A stone taken from the Mists, steeped in its power.</c>

name: Pet Sprout
description: <c=@flavor>This young carnivorous plant could use something with a bit more kick to keep it growing. Some Rhand Blessed Plant Food should do the trick.</c>

name: Enormous Foxfire Cluster
description:
This powerful cluster of foxfire still needs a catalyst to fully unlock its growth potential.
Double-click to show.

name: Third Birthday Gift
description: Double-click to open.

name: Beetle Remains
description: Event Item

name: Bag of Spirit Shards
description: Double-click to gain 5 spirit shards.

name: Mini Monkey King
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Water of Rhand
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Piquant Plant Food, Bloodstone Dust, and Thick Leather Sections to create a Package of Rhand Blessed Plant Food.

<c=@flavor>The Font of Rhand is known to be a very magical place.</c>

name: Tempest Greatsword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Birthday Blaster
description: Click to equip the Birthday Blaster.

name: Resonating Chaos Orb
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with a Clay Pot, Bloodstone Dust, and Foxfire Clusters to create a Chaos Infused Clay Pot.

<c=@flavor>This orb is clearly very powerful. It buzzes and warbles as if it can't contain its mirth.</c>

name: Package of Elementally Charged Plant Food
description:
Double-click to feed to your Pet Seedling.

<c=@flavor>Watch your fingers—this food occasionally gives you a bit of a jolt.</c>

name: Empty Vial
description: Can be filled with Mending Oasis Water by stepping into the oasis.

name: Heart of the Destroyer
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with a Heat Stone, Bloodstone Bricks, and a +5 Agony Infusion to create a Destroyer Heated Stone.

<c=@flavor>A steaming hot stone from the core of a powerful Destroyer.</c>

name: Permanent Guild Flag Finisher
description: Stake your claim on your defeated enemy's location when you finish your foes in PvP or WvW. This is a permanent account unlock.

name: Silver-Fed Salvage-o-Matic
description: Double-click to salvage crafting materials from an item in your inventory. 25% chance of rarer materials. 80% chance of recovering upgrades from items.

name: Mini Candy Corn Skritt
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Gift from Mawdrey II
description: Double-click to open Mawdrey II's gift.

name: Grow Lamp
description: <c=@flavor>Just needs a little extra something to attune this lamp for maximum growth potential.</c>

name: Chaos Staff Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Chaos Sword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Tempest Focus Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: Glowing Green Mask
description: Double-click to imbue another helmet item's stats into this appearance (one-time ability).

name: Pet Seedling
description: <c=@flavor>This young carnivorous plant looks hungry for something particularly magical. Some Elementally Charged Plant Food should satisfy its cravings.</c>

name: Powerful Grow Lamp
description:
Double-click to shine on your Pet Shoot.

<c=@flavor>Armed with a light that shone in the dark, this lamp is very powerful.</c>

name: Chaos Trident Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other trident.

name: Arid Skritt Cache
description: Double-click to gain Silky Sand and loot.

name: Chaos Focus Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: Mini Chieftain Utahein
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Heat Stone
description: <c=@flavor>A simple heat stone isn't quite enough to channel the sweltering temperatures of the deep Maguuma Jungle.</c>

name: Mini Mad King Head
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Destroyer Heated Stone
description:
Double-click to warm your Pet Plantling.

<c=@flavor>Special care should be taken with this hot stone if you don't want to get burned.</c>

name: Chaos Torch Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other torch.

name: Chaos Dagger Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Tempest Scepter Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

name: Pet Plantling
description: <c=@flavor>Your dear plantling has grown quite a bit, but it seems to ache for the warmth of the Maguuma Jungle. Something to warm it thoroughly, like a Destroyer Heated Stone, should keep it toasty.</c>

name: Mawdrey II
description: Double-click to feed 50 Bloodstone Dust in exchange for a gift. Mawdrey II will become full if fed too much dust in a day.

name: Tempest Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Veteran Dust Mite Cache
description: Double-click to gain Obsidian Shards, Geodes, Silky Sand, and other loot.

name: Mists Infused Clay Pot
description:
Double-click to plant your Pet Seed in this pot.

<c=@flavor>A pot infused with the energy of the Mists.</c>

name: Ambrite Display Case
description: Double-click to select one Ambrite Fossil.

name: Chaos Pistol Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other pistol.

name: Pile of Elemental Essence
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with Meaty Plant Food, Bloodstone Dust, and Thick Leather Sections to create a Package of Elementally Charged Plant Food.

<c=@flavor>A crackling pile of elementally charged essence.</c>

name: Pet Shoot
description: <c=@flavor>Growth seems to be slowing again. You need an even bigger kick of sun to speed back up the growth process. Something like a Powerful Grow Lamp would be perfect.</c>

name: Cultivated Seed
description: <c=@flavor>The first seed cultivated and produced by your own hand. To cultivate this new specimen to be even better than the last, plant in a Chaos Infused Clay Pot to germinate.</c>

name: Package of Rhand Blessed Plant Food
description:
Double-click to feed to your Pet Sprout.

<c=@flavor>Soaked in water from the Font of Rhand.</c>

name: Attuned Grow Lamp
description:
Double-click to shine on a Cultivated Shoot.

<c=@flavor>With a hefty helping of luck, this lamp should get the most stubborn of plants to grow toward its light.</c>

name: Arid Devourer Cache
description: Double-click to gain Silky Sand and loot.

name: Tempest Axe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Arid Inquest Cache
description: Double-click to gain Silky Sand and loot.

name: Chaos Warhorn Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other warhorn.

name: Champion Vined Cache
description: Double-click to gain Champion Bags, Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Geodes, a Zephyrite Lockpick, Silky Sand, and other loot.

name: Tempest Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Tempest Warhorn Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other warhorn.

name: Recipe: Heat Stone
description: Double-click to learn the recipe for a Heat Stone.

name: Chaos Scepter Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other scepter.

name: Box of Captured Light
description:
Combine in the Mystic Forge with a Grow Lamp, Bloodstone Bricks, and exotic Essence of Luck to create a Powerful Grow Lamp.

<c=@flavor>Every crack in its container glows from the light within.</c>

name: Miniature Glowing Bat
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Chaos Short Bow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Tempest Staff Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other staff.

name: Chaos Harpoon Gun Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other harpoon gun.

name: Chaos Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Pristine Sand-Carved Cache
description: Double-click to gain Geodes, Silky Sand, Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Obsidian Shards, Mystic Clovers, Zephyrite Lockpicks, and the choice of one Ambrite Fossil.

name: Dust Mite Cache
description: Double-click to gain Silky Sand and loot.

name: Mini Svanir
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Chaos Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: Tempest Short Bow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Tempest Dagger Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other dagger.

name: Tempest Torch Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other torch.

name: Chaos Hammer Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

name: Veteran Vined Cache
description: Double-click to gain Obsidian Shards, Geodes, Silky Sand, and other loot.

name: Chaos Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Champion Arid Devourer Cache
description: Double-click to gain Champion Bags, Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Geodes, a Zephyrite Lockpick, Silky Sand, and other loot.

name: Tempest Longbow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other longbow.

name: Tempest Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.

name: Champion Dust Mite Cache
description: Double-click to gain Champion Bags, Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Geodes, a Zephyrite Lockpick, Silky Sand, and other loot.

name: Raiment of the Lich
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Tempest Sword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Veteran Arid Skritt Cache
description: Double-click to gain Obsidian Shards, Geodes, Silky Sand, and other loot.

name: Chaos Spear Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other spear.

name: Champion Arid Inquest Cache
description: Double-click to gain Champion Bags, Dragonite Ore, Empyreal Fragments, Geodes, a Zephyrite Lockpick, Silky Sand, and other loot.

name: Mawdrey (Infused)
description: <c=@flavor>After spending so much time cultivating this powerful vine through the generations, it's hard to not feel an attachment to it. Your beloved pet almost cuddles you in its tendrils. Clearly it feels a similar attachment.</c>

name: Tireless Harvesting Minion
description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

name: Mawdrey
description: <c=@flavor>After spending so much time cultivating this powerful vine through the generations, it's hard to not feel an attachment to it. Your beloved pet almost cuddles you in its tendrils. Clearly it feels a similar attachment.</c>

name: Fused Molten Logging Axe
description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.

name: Mysterious Vine
description: <c=@flavor>This vine, while appearing to be touched by Mordremoth, has been grown from seed under the good influence of a hero of Tyria.<c>

name: Fused Molten Sickle
description: Used to harvest all plants. Unlimited use.

name: Cultivated Vine
description: <c=@flavor>This vine that you cultivated from seed, seems to almost like you. Is it possible that it is loyal to you as a child is to a parent?</c>

name: Tireless Logging Minion
description: Perfect for use on all types of trees. Unlimited use.
